statements: DELETE FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE driving_speed > 60 AND fuel_efficiency < 20.5;
DELETE FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE driver_id = 101 AND driving_speed > 70;
DELETE FROM driver_performance_metrics WHERE fuel_efficiency < 0.2 AND driving_speed < 60;
DELETE FROM speed_metrics WHERE driver_id = 123 AND speed > 100
DELETE FROM fuel_metrics WHERE fuel_efficiency < 20 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE trip_id = 203 AND driving_speed < 80;
DELETE FROM Trips WHERE distance_traveled < 100 AND start_location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
